tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE festival_logistics (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transportation_schedule TEXT,
    accommodation_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Transportation (
    transport_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_type VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    transport_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Accommodation (
    accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(255),
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    check_out_time TIMESTAMP,
    room_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_schedule ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50), 
    departure_time TIME, 
    arrival_time TIME 
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_details ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    location VARCHAR(100), 
    check_in DATE, 
    check_out DATE, 
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE festival_stakeholders ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(100), 
    role VARCHAR(50), 
    contact_number VARCHAR(15), 
    accommodation_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (accommodation_id) REFERENCES accommodation_details(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route VARCHAR(100),
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_time TIME,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_details (
    accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    room_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(8, 2)
);
